## Who is Anandita?

Anandita Misra is an Economics student at NUS. She has keen interest and great belief in the applicative powers of behavioral economics for social impact and in influencing us to make better choices day in and day out. Her goal is to contribute to the development of effective strategies that empower individuals to make better choices.
